description:
Offered in English and German
Relego is an Open Source Read It Later client for webOS. Using your Read It Later account you can save links to web pages which you can then read when you have time. This is one way you can share links from your desktop to your phone. There are homebrew patches that allow you to save links from the webOS browser directly into Relego.

Relego was developed by a team of programmers from around the world in a one-day Hackathon sponsored by webOSroundup. Feedback & suggestions are welcome.

Read It Later is a trademark of Idea Shower, LLC. Relego is not affiliated with Idea Shower, LLC.
